mapper.sql: SELECT c.*, u.nickname, IF(f.state = 0, f.path, NULL) avatar FROM mk_community_comment c LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON u.avatar = f.id WHERE c.root_id = ${articleId}
mapper.select: AND c.reply_id IS NULL AND c.parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY IF(${type} = 1, c.create_time, c.create_time * -1) ASC
SELECT c.content, u.nickname FROM mk_community_comment c LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.root_id = ${articleId} AND c.parent_id = ${commentId} AND c.reply_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3

SELECT c.*, u.nickname, IF(f.state = 0, f.path, NULL) avatar, IF(c.reply_id IS NOT NULL AND c.reply_id != c.parent_id, ( SELECT inu.nickname FROM mk_community_comment inc LEFT JOIN mk_user inu ON inc.user_id = inu.id WHERE inc.id = c.reply_id), NULL) reply_nickname FROM mk_community_comment c LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON u.avatar = f.id WHERE c.parent_id = ${commentId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mk_community_comment WHERE parent_id = ${commentId} AND reply_id IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE mk_community_comment SET praise_num = praise_num + 1 WHERE id = ${commentId}
UPDATE mk_community_comment SET praise_num = praise_num - 1 WHERE id = ${commentId}
